level.heading: Exceptions.
level.text: This chapter shall not apply to any cosmetic unless the cosmetic is a drug as defined by § 201 of the Food, Drug and Cosmetic Act.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 8-137, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 48-701.

level.heading: References in Text
level.text: Section 201 of the Food, Drug and Cosmetic Act is codified at 21 U.S.C. § 321.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: The reference to "§ 201 of the Food, Drug and Cosmetic Act" was corrected from "§ 321 of the Food, Drug and Cosmetic Act" as it appeared in D.C. Law 8-137.
